item.title: [RBX1][Network] - Migrating network equipments in 2 steps
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 7, 19:00 UTC  -  Jun 9, 02:00 UTC

Jun 2, 08:56 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/06/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 09/06/2023 02:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of the end-of-life process, we will be migrating some network devices in end-of-life to new infrastructure in order to improve our reliability.
This operation will handled in 2 steps to avoid any outage.
Step 1 : From 07/06/2023 19:00 UTC to 08/06/2023 02:00 UTC
Step 2 : From 08/06/2023 19:00 UTC to 09/06/2023 02:00 UTC

item.title: [WAW][Dedicated servers] - W04A13 W04A14 W04A15 W04A12 W04A11 W04A10
item.description:
Jun 7, 12:54 UTC
Update - Most of of the impacted servers are up anew.
Our technical team continue to work on the remaining ones.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Jun 7, 11:29 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 7, 11:18 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/06/2023 10:46 UTC
Service impact : All the servers are unreachable on these racks
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [RBX8][Dedicated servers]-Rooms R807L and R809R
item.description:
Jun 7, 14:11 UTC

item.title: [GRA2][Dedicated servers/Public-Private Network] - G265B05
item.description:
Jun 7, 09:01 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 07/06/2023 07:15 UTC
End Time : 07/06/2023 07:30 UTC
Service impact:Public and Private network were unreachable on this rack
Root cause : One of our service provider caused this electrical disruption.
All impacted services are now operational.

item.title: [Gra2][Private/Public Network] - G267B06
item.description:
Jun 7, 08:40 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Start time : 07/06/2023 07:12 UTC
End time : 07/06/2023 07:27 UTC
Service status : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : It was due to a disruption on the electrical distribution.

Jun 7, 08:25 UTC
Update - Start time : 07/06/2023 07:12 UTC
End time : 07/06/2023 07:27 UTC
Service status : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : It was due to a disruption on the electrical distribution.

Jun 7, 07:30 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 7, 07:29 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/06/2023 07:12 UTC
Service impact : Dedicated servers are unreachable on this rack
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
